mapper.sql: select sessionId, login_name, dept_name, ipaddr, login_location, browser, os, status, start_timestamp, last_access_time, expire_time from sys_user_online
mapper.insert: replace into sys_user_online(sessionId, login_name, dept_name, ipaddr, login_location, browser, os, status, start_timestamp, last_access_time, expire_time) values (#{sessionId}, #{loginName}, #{deptName}, #{ipaddr}, #{loginLocation}, #{browser}, #{os}, #{status}, #{startTimestamp}, #{lastAccessTime}, #{expireTime})
mapper.select: o WHERE o.last_access_time <= #{lastAccessTime} ORDER BY o.last_access_time ASC
